titleStmt.title: The Hang-mans lamenration [sic] for the losse of Sir Arthur Haslerigge, dying in the Tower. Being a dialogue between Esquire Dun, and Sir Arthur Haslerig with their last conference in the the Tower of London a little before sir Arthurs death.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho Vere and VV Gil[b]ertson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
